name: Leaps and Rebounds
description: Leaps and Rebounds specializes in providing high-quality mini fitness trampolines, known as rebounders, designed for low-impact cardiovascular exercise. Their products are built with durable materials, including bungee cords instead of springs, to ensure a safer, quieter, and more effective workout experience.

products.name: Mini Fitness Trampoline
products.description: A rebounder made from super strong steel, suitable for both fun and fitness goals.

products.name: Trampoline Handle Bar
products.description: An attachable stabilizer bar that enhances the trampoline workout by providing additional support.

products.name: Limited American Edition
products.description: A premium, pre-assembled rebounder offering maximum surface area for an enhanced rebounding experience.

promotions.title: Valentine's Sale
promotions.details: Free shipping within the US in 2-6 business days, 30-day risk-free return policy, and lifetime warranty on rebounders and stabilizer bars.

additional_info.BBB_accreditation: Leaps & Rebounds is NOT a BBB Accredited Business.
